data.prayer: Jesus, make the 763,939 people in the state of Corrientes who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Corrientes, Argentina
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Corrientes, Argentina humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary: On average, 66 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Corrientes, Argentina.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Corrientes, Argentina not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 102,903 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, 0.2% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please defend the 102,903 believers in Corrientes against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, let the threatened of Corrientes, Argentina know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Corrientes, Argentina to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
